name: Ameline and the Ultimate Burger
description: The king was cursed, and won't eat anything! Bring him the Ultimate Burger and revive his appetite... but beware, the power of the Ultimate Burger will make the whole kingdom drool, defend it with your needles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 202 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Gamepads Recommended
